actions.text: On agreeing to the Becerra amendments (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 1 (Roll no. 32).

description: Amendments add age discrimination laws to the list of anti-discrimination measures which are exempt from the bill's provisions.
purpose: An amendment (comprised of amendments numbered 30 and 31 as printed in the Congressional Record) to add age discrimination laws to the list of anti-discrimination measures which are exempt from the bill's provisions.
